sections.text: to 2131. of the Revised Code:(A) "Will" includes codicils to wills admitted to probate, lost, spoliated, or destroyed wills, and instruments dec

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not affect the proceedings or extend the time for contesting the validity of any will or for asserting rights thereunder
sections.text: The record provided for in such sections must show that the original record was destroyed, and the time, as near as may be, when the will was originally admit

sections.heading: the Revised Code apply to later wills admitted to probate.
